###
### Fast Levelling: Faster Variant (very cheaty!)
### by Apocalyptech
###
### I wanted a way to quickly level a character up for testing purposes
### so that's what this mod provides.  Increases XP gains by 250x.
###
### Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
### https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
###
### Generated by gen_fast_levelling.py
###

# Base XP Scaling
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/Experience/Att_BaseEnemyExperience.Att_BaseEnemyExperience:ValueResolver_PlayThroughDefinedAttributeValueResolver,Value.PlaythroughOne.BaseValueConstant,0,,2500
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/Experience/Att_BaseEnemyExperience.Att_BaseEnemyExperience:ValueResolver_PlayThroughDefinedAttributeValueResolver,Value.PlaythroughTwoAndBeyond.BaseValueConstant,0,,2500

# Remove XP Scaling by level differences
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[0].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[0].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
